name: Rush Garden
description:
Hi! This is my submission for my first Ludum Dare Jam, LD number 40! I'm really happy with how much functionality I managed to pack inside it in 3 days, although the art side of things is not doing as good as usual. I tried to make some more detailed assets for it but I didn't have the energy to integrate it all visually, and I felt like this rough style drawn straight in Construct 2's sprite editor had a certain style to it.

Enjoy it and tell me how you find it, I'll go to sleep now... :)
